questions.question: To write a single-line comment, you use ______.
To write a multi-line comment, you start with ______ and end with ______.
To print 'Hello, World!' to the console, you use ______.
To print the value of a variable x to the console, you use ______.
To write an inline comment after a statement, you use ______.
To print the result of a function call myFunction() to the console, you use ______.
To print a string and a variable together, you use ______.
To print a string and a variable using template literals, you use ______.
To write a comment explaining the next line of code, you use ______.
To print a warning message to the console, you use ______.
